kdl.prox.model2.rpt.modules.splitting
Class DefaultSplittingModule

java.lang.Object
  kdl.prox.model2.rpt.modules.splitting.DefaultSplittingModule
All Implemented Interfaces:
RPTSplittingModule
public class DefaultSplittingModule
extends java.lang.Object
implements RPTSplittingModule

The default splitting module computes contingency tables for all possible splits and finds the one with the best gStatistic.
